pkgmetadata.longdescription: The ETSDevTools project from the Enthought Tool Suite includes a set of packages that can be used during the development of a software project, for understanding, debugging, testing, and inspecting code: * Enthought Developer Tool Suite (enthought.developer): A collection of utilities, designed to ease the development and debugging of Traits-based programs. They can be used as plug-ins to your Envisage application while you are developing it, and then removed when you are ready to release it. * Endo: A Traits-aware tool for processing API documentation of Python code. It extracts not only docstrings, but also plain comments that immediately precede variable assignments (both module-scope variables and class attributes). * enthought.guitest: A collection of utilities for unit testing user interfaces (translation of the Perl X11::GUITest and Win32::GuiTest modules). * enthought.testing: Scripts related to running unit tests, based on testoob, and also allowing running test suites in separate processes and aggregating the results. * enthought.debug: A collection of debugging tools, not to be included in production code. NOTE: These tools are functional, but are not being developed or supported. They have been mainly superceded by the tools in the Enthought Developer Tool Suite.
